translated: Kahlström, Bror Bertil, editor, Visby, b. 24/8/01 in Visby to P. A. K. and Elisabet Hallman. Married in 1932 to Elisabeth Andersson. — Graduated from high school in Visby in 1920. Collaborator in the newspaper Gotlänningen since 1920, later became the chief editor and responsible for its publication. Member of the IOGT (International Organization of Good Templars), involved in the temperance movement in the Gotland district and responsible for the county temperance board. Also involved in the Visby temperance board and served as the secretary of the Ailm. Song Association in Visby from 1929-1946. Member of the management board for the southeastern region of the Swedish Publishing Association. Member of the MHF (Temperance and Abstinence Association) and the Public Choir.
